document.full_text: the u.n. world food program (wfp) said it had resumed operations in two states in south sudan halted after a wave of violence before secession in july.
document.title: u.n. resumes food aid in south sudan states
lines_and_colors: the u.n. world food program (wfp) said it had resumed operations in two states in south sudan halted after a wave of violence before secession in july.
